h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area
h3_title: Speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart One More Time
content: Once the Rusty-Gold Cart is beaten, speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart who lies by a rock nearby. After the conversation and the cutscene, you can then approach the frozen-over entrance and break through to head inside.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_5_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 5 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection '' and the sub-subsection 'Speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart One More Time'.
The content is as follows:
Once the Rusty-Gold Cart is beaten, speak to the Pale-Axe Stalwart who lies by a rock nearby. After the conversation and the cutscene, you can then approach the frozen-over entrance and break through to head inside.
